name: encrypting
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
present participle of
encrypt
to change electronic information or signals into a secret code (= system of letters, numbers, or symbols) that people cannot understand or use on normal equipment: Your financial information is fully encrypted and cannot be accessed.
